header.author: John Morley
header.title: AN ESSAY ON THE NATURE and CURE OF THE KING's EVIL; DEDUCED FROM OBSERVATIONS and PRACTICE. The SECOND EDITION: With an ADDITION of REMARKABLE CASES of poor Sufferers, cured by the Author. Seriously recommended to the Perusal of all unhappy Persons and Families labouring under any Scrophulous Complaints, which have hitherto eluded all Attempts to remove them. Facts are stubborn Things.
